Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Plantaricin KL-1Y (natural AMPs; bacteriocins; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; More AMPs)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 39.4% similar toPlantaricin CS.Activity:  Active against B. coagulans JCM 2257T, B. cereus JCM 2152T, L. innocua ATCC 33090T, S. aureus TISTR 118, E. coli O157:H7 and E. coli ATCC 8739.Synergy:AMPs?:  It showed synergistic effects with KL-1X and KL-1Z, two additional peptides whose sequences have not been established.
Literature Information.Author: Rumjuankiat K, Perez RH, Pilasombut K, Keawsompong S, Zendo T, Sonomoto K, Nitisinprasert S.2015
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of a novel plantaricin, KL-1Y, from Lactobacillus plantarum KL-1.
